Description:
Job Details:Role: IP Core Network EngineerContract: 12 months & extendableWork Location: Dubai, United Arab Emirates Job Responsibilities: Responsible of Major Node Modernization within Etisalat IP Core network.
Responsible of IP Network Design & Optimization within Etisalat IP Core network
Engage with vendor & test all new features within Etisalat Lab before implementing on Etisalat IP Core Live network.
Build automation use cases and network intelligence architecture/design
Capacity planning for IP Core Network vs forecast / traffic trends
Build IP design with vendors for required changes & optimization in IP core network
Perform capacity planning for IP core network vs forecast & previous traffic trends
Preparation & Lab testing for design changes with existing network nodes to prepare for migrations
Monitor & Analyze network performance KPIs and advise on required enhancements
Build configuration MOPs with vendors for pilot implementation of design changes & upgrade
Discuss with operations & service design teams for migration projects and prepare the required checks before & after migration
Implementation of pilot sites migration with no service impact
Assure smooth implementation of network modernization within scheduled project period
Optimize current deployed IP designs to reduce resources utilization & improve efficiency
Study Industry trends in Automation and Intelligence with vendors
Build automation and network intelligence architecture including all necessary integrations with different systems in EtisalatSkills
Skills: Start Date: Immediate joiners to 30 Days of Notice period
Salary & Benefits: (Negotiable based on the expertise)
Important Note: Need candidates to be inside the country
